irauenzahn053.shapes

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • irauenzahn053.shapes.Shape
      • irauenzahn053.shapes.Line

  • public class Line
extends Shape
    Represents a line, has some simple mathematical calculations and can draw itself given a Processing PApplet
    Version:
    10/17/18
    Author:
    irauenzahn053

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Line other)
        Returns true if this line segment and the segment other intersect each other. Returns false if they do not intersect.
        Parameters:
